data.name: Animperium
data.detailed_description:
Build your army to defeat the enemy! Send your swordsman out first, deal massive damage with the war mage and make sure you have enough healers in your back hand for support! Send your workers across the map to collect resources or construct buildings.


Increase your economy by building windmills! Use the school to unlock tier 2 units! Protect your own town hall by building defensive walls.


Explore the underground! Dig tunnels beneath the surface. Collect the rare ore resource and use it to train advanced units. But be careful! The enemy is also lurking underground!
data.about_the_game:
Build your army to defeat the enemy! Send your swordsman out first, deal massive damage with the war mage and make sure you have enough healers in your back hand for support! Send your workers across the map to collect resources or construct buildings.


Increase your economy by building windmills! Use the school to unlock tier 2 units! Protect your own town hall by building defensive walls.


Explore the underground! Dig tunnels beneath the surface. Collect the rare ore resource and use it to train advanced units. But be careful! The enemy is also lurking underground!
data.short_description: Animperium is a turn-based strategy tabletop game! Fight with other players for resources to expand your army and buildings to destroy the enemy's main base! Explore the underground to gather resources in the later game and surprise the enemy from below!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDEA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 6500 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDEA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
